title: Margarita

recipeinfo.blurb: A delicious drink to be enjoyed with Mexican food.
recipeinfo.author: David Horton

serving: Serve with Mexican food. Always drink responsibly.
notes: It is easy to expand the recipe to serve more people since the Tequila, Triple Sec, lime juice and sour mix are equal in proportion. For example, using 1 Cup of each ingredient would yield 8 margaritas since there are 8 ounces in a cup. See, your math teacher was right, you do need to know this ratio stuff!
